_header: I am a child and born full bare / And bare out of this world shall fare
Title(s): ‘When I think on my Ending Day’
Subjects: carols, of mortality; death, approach of
_description: ‘When I think on my Ending Day’ — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘I drukke I dare so wil I may / Quan I thynke on myn endyng day’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
I am a chyld & born ful bare& bare out of this word xal
                    fare…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…To jhesu cryst my sowle I betakeHe be our help on
                    domysday
